senses.sense_definition: A residential institution for the care and protection of orphans.

examples.text: She grew up in a local <w>orphanage</w> before being adopted by a loving family.
The charity raised enough money to build a new <w>orphanage</w> for the children.

senses.sense_definition: The state or condition of being an orphan.

examples.text: The novel depicts the sorrow and loneliness of sudden <w>orphanage</w>.
He struggled with the hardships of <w>orphanage</w> throughout his early life.
